author: jgallacher
msg: New configure file generated by autoconf from the changed configure.in file.

author: jgallacher
msg: Added --with-python-src to configure.in to aid in building the documentation.
The path to the python source, which is required to build the docs, can now be specified at configure time instead of manually editing Doc/Makefile.

author: hlship
msg: Fix some typos in the Tapestry 4.0-beta-1 release notice.

author: jgallacher
msg: Added a stub for the FileSession documentation.
